entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Gaunt is described as snarling in Parseltongue and being defiant towards Ogden. He is also mentioned as spitting on the floor.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is described as falling silent again when Gaunt speaks to him in Parseltongue. He is also mentioned as being involved in an unprovoked attack on a defenceless Muggle.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is described as speaking firmly and trying to reason with Gaunt. He is also mentioned as having wiped the Muggle's face clean for him.

relationships.description: Gaunt is referred to as Morfin's father, and their relationship is implied through Gaunt's actions and words towards Morfin.
Ogden and Gaunt are described as being in a heated discussion, with Ogden trying to reason with Gaunt and Gaunt sneering at Ogden.
